A solution developed to simplify an industry

A platform that puts connectivity in your hands

Configure your connectivity

ZenCross Connect (zXc) is a unique ordering platform that provides pre‑provisioned, on‑demand dark fiber and lit services between major data centers and colocation facilities in and around New York and New Jersey.

• Online Ordering
• Month-to-Month Contracts
• Services Delivered Within 15 Days
